content.raw:
I made a few videos of the plugin in action: [https://vimeo.com/showcase/6002766](https://vimeo.com/showcase/6002766) .

Is there a channel where I can watch when a new release of Gazebo happens? I’ll write a post to community then. But so far, I’ve seen that the blog is kind of dead, and almost no release announcments are made on community…
